request_types.barrier_report: I want to report an accessibility barrier
request_types.general_comment: I have a general comment about accessibility
request_types.alt_document_request: I want to request a document in an alternate format
request_types.general_question: I have a question related to accessibility

barrier_report.label: What accessibility barrier did you face?
barrier_report.hint: Please describe the situation, issue or barrier in as much detail as possible. If the barrier was physical, in which building, floor, area, etc., was it located? If the barrier was web-related, on which site did it occur? Include a link if possible.

alt_document_request.label: What document would you like to receive?
alt_document_request.hint: Please provide the document name and year of publication, or its URL.

general_question.label: What is your question?
general_question.hint: Please let us know how we can help you in as much detail as possible
